verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Everybody ought to know
Everybody ought to know
Everybody ought to know
Who Jesus is

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Everybody ought to tell
Everybody ought to tell
Everybody ought to tell
Who Jesus is

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's the fairest of ten thousand
He's the bright and morning star
He's the lily of the valley
Everybody ought to know
